name: Sucker Punch
description:
Please scroll down for Desktop version download.

Recently-retired old-man Kraken is fed up with the increasing traffic from the A1 being redirected through his slice of paradise. Crush ships and put the new overpass to bed.

Sucker Punch is a arcade game about smashing ships and racking up points. It features an online leaderboard, 2 game modes and plenty of destruction.

I strongly recommend downloading the desktop version for the optimum experience.

Note: Some features have been removed from the HTML version due to time constraints

Sucker Punch was made entirely in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33

If you enjoy the game please vote for it here

Thanks and hope you enjoy.
